title: Iran partially closes Strait of Hormuz, a vital oil choke point, as Tehran holds talks with U.S.
summary_full: Iranian state media reported the partial closure of the Strait of Hormuz on Tuesday for military drills in the waterway.
summary_public: Iranian state media reported the partial closure of the Strait of Hormuz on Tuesday for military drills in the waterway.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: partially closes Strait of Hormuz, a vital oil choke point
